_description: Sir Otuel (Otuel and Roland) — in 12-line stanzas

BLAdd37492.First Lines:
Herkenyth lordynges & ȝeuyth lystIn the worchyp of ihesu
                    cryst…
BLAdd37492.Last Lines:
…To hys blysse ous and hem both bryngTo Leuen wyth oute bale
                    Amen quod I
BLAdd37492.Editions:
O’Sullivan,  M. I.,
                        ed.  
             Firumbras and Otuel and Roland.
EETS
         o.s. 198 (1935); repr. 1987: 59-146.
